mapper.update:
update deliveryid
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Con_Id = #{conId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
said = #{said,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_order_no = #{deliveryOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_receivable = #{amountReceivable,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actual_money = #{actualMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
owe_money = #{oweMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ddate = #{ddate,jdbcType=DATE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update deliveryid set sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Con_Id = #{conId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, said = #{said,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_order_no = #{deliveryOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_receivable = #{amountReceivable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_money = #{actualMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, owe_money = #{oweMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ddate = #{ddate,jdbcType=DATE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}
